TopicTitle: Came from /r/ksp. Now im here too! Thought i'd show off Mun Town.

Articles.Content:
Mun Town! (Large Gallery)

Hello...I came from reddit. Joined you fine folks over here too now that you are back up. Few weeks ago i posted Mun Town on reddit so to some it may be re-postish.

Mods used: B-9, Infernal Robotics, Nova Punch and Mech Jeb. Hope you like it! Hope i posted this in the right place!
That is legitimately impressive! I could never be patient enough to build and assemble that.
Words fail. A true masterpiece . And welcome aboard!
Truly wonderful. Welcome to the forum.
I hand you my entire collection of internets. You win them all, my friend.

I'm at a loss for words here, I must say.

I was rather amused until I got to the part where you flew each one and landed them. Then I was amazed.

Here, have some rep points that don't really do anything in appreciation. I'd give you a medal if I could.

Thanks for the kind words you guys having it appreciated is what made it all worth the effort. ALso I'm happy to hand out any part of mun town should someone care to check it out in the VAB or send a piece off to the mun yourself

Wwwwwow.

That is amazing. Thank you for sharing it. Some ingenious (and funny) building there.

This just. This is a thing.

You have done well.
I actually saw this when you posted on reddit. Thanks for sharing here... It's brilliant.
